This has actually been an age-old glitch, called the 'Magic Turbine'.

> 
> This has actually been an age-old glitch, called the 'Magic Turbine'.

His Magic Turbine is smaller than any I\'ve seen before though.

Mine had to be five tanks tall to keep going.
I\'ve seen screenshots of magic turbines that were only a CM, an RCS tank and a bunch of winglets.

well its not new but iv not seen it before ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) i tried doing it with an RCS tank and thrusters but it was hard getting up to speed, i could manage it about 1 in 5 tries.

iv attached the .craft file, have fun.

its insane to fly, you first have to get upto speed then its easy, you can fly at 400m/s in low atmo.

you can fly around up to about 10K after that its too thin to accelerate, if you pick up speed after liftoff you can easily reach 30K without using rockets.
This looks like some kind of wizardry..

The G force is insane when you turn..

Squad should implement a feature where the Kerbals pass out in excess of 10 Gs. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
